'''0.9849<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/44360628899/a-new-minecraftedu-snapshot-is-now-live|title=A new MinecraftEdu snapshot is now live! |date=March 2, 2013 |website=Tumblr|author=Aleksi Postari}}</ref>''' is a version of {{El|MinecraftEdu}}, released on March 2, 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.4.7]].

== Additions ==
* Based on [[Java Edition 1.4.7]].
* Ability to download world templates (work in progress)
* Ability to create world templates from your own saved worlds.
* Forge mod support to run many popular mods such as ComputerCraft.
** Ability to update (+downgrade) MinecraftEdu using the launcher.
